phrs.translation: 港湾和城市, 对沉默的腰部, 观看城市和港口

sentences.translation: 埃德加以蹲坐的姿势蹲下。

sentences.sentence: The cat sat back on its haunches, shook its head sadly, meowed softly and strolled out of the room.
sentences.translation: 猫坐起来，伤心地摇摇它的头，轻轻地叫着，慢慢地走出房间。

sentences.sentence: This year, after scrambling for position in a sea of reporters, I decide to squat on my haunches so I won't get in the way of our TV camera's view.
sentences.translation: 今年，我好不容易在记者的人山人海中抢到一个位置后，决定先蹲坐下来，这样就不会挡住摄像机的镜头。
